heading: Ricoh Ri 1000 DTG Printer Package
paragraphs: Ricoma has partnered with Ricoh to present to you an award-winning DTG printer that will revolutionize your business.
So, if you're ready to produce vivid prints on a variety of garments, look no further than the Ri 1000 direct-to-garment printer package!
With this combination of financing and quality, you can seamlessly print superior quality images on light or dark garments for as low as $249/month with 0% financing and free shipping.
